text: The 2012–13 Manchester City F.C. season was Manchester City's 111th season, 11th English Premier League season in a row, and their 21st season in the Premier League since the team was created. == Squad == == Season == === Overall === Tournament Result FA Community Shield Winner English Premier League 2nd Football League Cup 3rd round FA Cup 2nd UEFA Champions League Group stage === FA Community Shield === === Premier League === ==== Table ==== Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 Manchester United 38 28 5 5 86 43 +43 89 2 Manchester City 38 23 9 6 69 33 +36 78 3 Chelsea 38 22 9 7 74 35 +39 75 4 Arsenal 38 21 9 8 72 38 +34 72 5 Tottenham Hotspur 38 21 9 8 66 46 +20 72 ==== Matches ==== === Football League Cup === === FA Cup === === UEFA Champions League === ==== Table ==== Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 Borussia Dortmund 6 4 2 0 11 5 +6 14 2 Real Madrid 6 3 2 1 15 9 +6 11 3 Ajax 6 1 1 4 8 16 –8 4 4 Manchester City 6 0 3 3 7 11 –4 3 ==== Matches ==== == Statistics == === Top scorers === These are the top scorers for all tournaments. ;17 goals * Carlos Tévez * Sergio Agüero ;15 goals * Edin Džeko ;10 goals * Yaya Touré ;5 goals * David Silva * Samir Nasri Category:2012 in association football Category:2013 in association football Category:2010s in Manchester Category:2012 in England Category:2013 in England Category:Manchester City F.C.
title: 2012–13 Manchester City F.C. season
